articles.title: Mother Arrested in Baby's Death Now at Large after Bonding Out
articles.description: A mother who was initially arrested after her baby was found dead is now at large after bonding out of jail, authorities say.

articles.title: Isolation left him 'forever torn up.' Critics urge Mecklenburg to end solitary confinement.
articles.description: A group of former inmates and clergy members gathered near the Mecklenburg County jail Thursday afternoon to speak out against the use of solitary confinement - and about the what they called the "barbaric" treatment of inmates.
